duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, build, and deploy ETL data pipelines, databases, features, and systems
Develop software with Java & Spring for REST API development
Utilize expertise in Spark for data engineering
Implement cloud technology, especially AWS, for data engineering tasks and projects
Work on full software development life cycle (SDLC) of data engineering projects
Lead and mentor junior members of the data engineering team

education_certification.credential: B.S. or higher in Computer Science, or related field
